body.name: Spin Mop Bucket with Wringer System Extended Mop Handle 61＂Mop and Bucket for Floors Cleaning with 5 Replacement Head Refill 1 Cleaning Brush Head
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【 Mop Heads is Washable 】：spin mop bucket system heads are‘t machine washable.Mop and Bucket with Wringer System comes with 5 reusable microfiber mop pads for a variety of floor types.

【 Wet or Dry Mopping 】： Use wet for a deep clean or use dry for dusting floors,ceilings, windows, and other surfaces. This spin mop and bucket system for cleaning Perfect for your hardwood floor, tile, concrete, and even glass windows.

【 Enjoy the quick-drying 】：Spin mop and bucket has 500 drain holes can dry mophead easily .The basket spins very fast, centrifugal force dries the mop fast and efficiently. Spin mop and bucket system has an agitator in the water reservoir for spin washing loosening dirt. Your hands stay clean and dry with this self-washing and wringing action and no physical effort is needed.

【Extended Stainless Steel Handle 61＂】：The spin mop can adjustable up to 61 inches which is short enough to clean stairs and long enough to dust ceilings. Improved Sturdy Construction of Stainless Steel Mop Handle, intellengent lock make a perfect handle,do housework much easier.
【 360° Spin Mop】：Spin Mop head with 360° rotation for those hard to reach areas.The whole point of design this mop was to minimize swipes and maximize cleaning efficiency.

【Free Of Charge Mop Head】：Spin mop and bucket wringer system set with 5 Replacement Head Refill and 1 Cleaning Brush Head. Fine soft brush for household cleaning can easily solve kitchen oil stains and bathroom tile stains. Tips:The entire mop pad goes into the water when in use during cleaning. Any of the photos where you see it half in the bucket are for product demonstration purposes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mop and bucket with wringer set Spin Mop & Bucket Floor Cleaning System provides a deep-cleaning solution. Mop and bucket with wringer set extendable mop pole can reach up to 61 inches. No need to bend over to avoid back aches. A hole in the top of the pole makes it hang up easily, and does not take up extra space. The stainless steel material makes the pole much stronger than the traditional plastic one. With the smart rotary lock switch, just turn the switch on/off for spinning, pushing down on a pole to wet/clean/rinse mop head.

Microfiber Spin Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set Dry & Clean: To thoroughly rinse mop place the mop in the bucket wringer. Making sure the switch is in Unlocked position. Use your hand to press up and down repeatedly. Thicker Mop Head: The thickened mop head has high water absorption and instantly absorbs sewage. Durable and machine washable head for dry and wet use, perfect for cleaning all types of floors. Pole Adjustment: To lengthen or shorten the pole, move switch to Unlock position once desired length is achieved move the switch in the locked position. Water Fill Line: Fill bucket with water. Do not fill above the indicated water line.

Replaceable Brush head easy clean concave and convex ground obstinate besmirch. Mop can reach and clean deep under furniture, alongside baseboards, and between tile. This value pack contains 5 extra refills, and each EasyWring Microfiber Refill lasts up to 3 months! Save time and money with long-lasting mop head replacements. It is safe for all hard floor surfaces, including finished hardwood, wood, laminate, tile, vinyl, and more.

What in Included in Spin Mop and Bucket with Wringer Set Microfiber mop heads are soft enough for any kinds of floors,such as hardwood,laminate,ceramic,tile,marble,etc Bucket x 1 Stainless Steel Handle (Comes in 3 parts) x 1 Mop Frame x 1 Microfiber Mop Head x 5 Mop brush head x 1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best surprise, handle stays in place when carrying 💜
reviews.reviewText: I own a cleaning company & I am very pleased with this product ♥️ works perfectly!!!Handle lock in place when carrying was best surprise!!!Love the spinner !!!Spinner works amazingly!Can almost dry the mop with the spinner !Bucket is also sturdy & light !Even better is that the mop extension is awesome, will work great for washing walls!!!Size is perfect!Super easy to use !!Love the brush attachment that comes with it !!!!And the extra mop heads that come with it, is an additional bonus !!!Buying another one right now !!!!Thank you!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well and I love the color scheme
reviews.reviewText: I wanted a spin mop and chose this one mostly for the color but also the brush head. after a few weeks of using, I only wish there was a separate tank for dirty water, the dirty water mixes with the rest of the water which kinda gives me the Ick so I normally mop twice after changing the water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the packaging. Each mop head replacement was vacuum sealed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good but could've be better
reviews.reviewText: I ordered because i tried a similar one but more expensive than this one and i thought it might be the same but unfortunately it wasnt and the performance of this one wasnt as expected however it might suit lots of users but since i tried a higher quality before this one i had a higher expectation,the defect was the container when it's full to the line of water it gets heavy more than what the handle would take so it slip to the side and spell water out, on the other hand when you squeeze the mop by the spinner it keeps spinning out of control and it doesn't stop until you tighten it, while using on the floor it goes wiggling and not staple,in General it could've been better

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: Very easy mop to use, I like how it has a spinning option where the liquid to mop is placed as well as to rinse the water. It can be made longer which is a pro if you plan on cleaning the walls with it. It does come with a brush (head) as well. The only flaw it has is that it does leave water on mop once its spinned down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received my package and the box it came in was perfectly fine upon opening it I realized it was most likely a returned product originally the bucket is cracked the handle is broke in half and one of the mop heads is discolored leading me to believe it was used at one point. Definitely disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have dogs, and wanted just a quick, tidy way to mop up between maid visits. I was concerned that this mop would be too small, and that the amount of water it held would be too little, but it's actually perfect. I don't have a lot of mopping experience, so take that with a grain of salt, but it totally mopped up the whole room in a snap.

ProsEl producto es de mejor calidad que el que venden verde en Sams o WalmartTrae un cepillo y varios repuestos.Es mas largo el telescopioEs mas grande los trapeadores así que cubres mas zonas.Si tardas menos trapeando no tocas el trapo y lo compré para que no despediciemos horas en trapear y dolor de espalda de agarcharse.ContrasSería bueno la cubeta tuviera para tirar el agua desde abajo o tuviera una esquina como en forma de jarra para evitar salpicadura.Los repuestos cuando se acaben creo va ser complicado conseguirlos.
